br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator

Class DefaultBeanValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.caelum.vraptor.validator.DefaultBeanValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanValidator

    @RequestScoped
@Component
public class DefaultBeanValidator
extends java.lang.Object
implements BeanValidator
    Implements the BeanValidator using Bean Validation especification (JSR303). This implementation will be enable by vraptor when any implementation of Bean Validation is available into classpath.
    Since:
    3.1.2
    Author:
    Ot√°vio Scherer Garcia

      java.util.List<Message> validateProperties(java.lang.Object bean, java.lang.String... properties)

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public java.util.List<Message> validate(java.lang.Object bean,
                               java.lang.Class<?>... groups)
        Description copied from interface: BeanValidator
        Validate the bean and return a list of messages if has constraint violations. If the object is null, an empty list will be returned.
        Specified by:
        validate in interface BeanValidator
        Parameters:
        bean - The object to be validated.
        groups - The groups that must be validated.
        Returns:
        List of constraint violations.

      • validateProperties

        public java.util.List<Message> validateProperties(java.lang.Object bean,
                                         java.lang.String... properties)
        Description copied from interface: BeanValidator
        Validate the specified bean's properties and return a list of messages if has constraint violations. If the object is null, an empty list will be returned.
        Specified by:
        validateProperties in interface BeanValidator
        Parameters:
        bean - The object to be validated.
        properties - The properties that must be validated.
        Returns:
        List of constraint violations.
